speaker: President.
english: President. The next item is the report by Mr Andrejevs, on behalf of the Committee on the Environment, Public Health and Food Safety, on combating HIV/AIDS within the European Union and in the neighbouring countries, 2006-2009 ( 2006/2232(INI) ( A6-0091/2007 ).
original: President. The next item is the report by Mr Andrejevs, on behalf of the Committee on the Environment, Public Health and Food Safety, on combating HIV/AIDS within the European Union and in the neighbouring countries, 2006-2009 ( 2006/2232(INI) ( A6-0091/2007 ).
agenda_item: Combating HIV/Aids within the EU and in the neighbouring countries 2006-2009 (debate)
